column1: Funeral Services for Ms. Beers will be held at the Chester C. Chidboy Funeral Home
column2: Inc.  of Curwensville on Wednesday June 24
column4: with the Reverend Stephen Shields officiating.  Interment will be in the Crown Crest Memorial Park in Hyde
column5: PA.  Friends will be received at the funeral home on Wednesday from Noon until time of services at 1 PM.
